properties.name: app.health.defaults.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable default health indicators.

properties.name: app.health.diskspace.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable disk space health check.

properties.name: app.health.liveness-state.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable liveness state health check.

properties.name: app.health.ping.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable ping health check.

properties.name: app.health.readiness-state.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable readiness state health check.

properties.name: app.health.ssl.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable SSL certificate health check.
